Now, writing all together:

The C code:

First, include stdio.

Then, the compute function.

Wait, the code setup in C:

#include <stdio.h>

double compute(int N_start, double d_start, double x_start) {
    int N = N_start;
    double d = d_start;
    double x = x_start;
    double ret = 0.0;
    while (N > 0) {
        ret += d + (N - 0.5) * x;
        double temp_d = d + (d / N) + (5 * x) / (2 * N);
        d = temp_d;
        double temp_x = x + (2 * x)/N;
        x = temp_x;
        N -=1;
    }
    return ret;
}

int main() {
    int N;
    double d, x;
    scanf("%d %lf %lf", &N, &d, &x);
    printf("%.10lf\n", compute(N, d, x));
    return 0;
}
